Medium: Pale green paper cover with lithographed illustrations by Rozanova on front and back; 16 lithographed illustrations (3 by Rozanova, 1 by Kul'bin, and 12 headpieces and tailpieces by Kruchenykh); lithographed manuscript text; all pages printed on pale green paper
Artist: Aleksei Kruchenykh, Nikolai Kul'bin, Olga Rozanova
CreditLine: Gift of The Judith Rothschild Foundation
